title: Display awaiting status in TUI list
description:
Update TUI list view to show awaiting status

Current display: Shows status symbol (○/●/✓), priority, title, labels

New display: Add awaiting indicator when set

Options:
A) Prefix indicator: [A] or ⏳ before title
B) Status suffix: "title [awaiting: approval]"
C) Color change: Different color for awaiting ticks
D) Symbol change: Different symbol (e.g., ◐ for awaiting)

Recommendation: Option D with color - minimal space, visually distinct

Implementation in internal/tui/model.go:
- Check tick.IsAwaitingHuman() in render
- Use different symbol and color
- Consider showing awaiting type on hover/selection
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Awaiting ticks visually distinct in list
- [ ] Works with Manual=true ticks (backwards compat)
- [ ] Doesn't clutter the display
- [ ] Consistent with existing visual language
closed_reason: Added awaiting status display to TUI list view using yellow ◐ symbol via new renderTickStatus function that checks IsAwaitingHuman(). Also displays awaiting type in detail view. Uses Catppuccin Yellow (#F9E2AF) for consistent palette.
